USE: The diffs are ordered by datamodel version number. The script can be run in a top down fashion and is expected to not failor overwrite old data
EXPECT: - "use business-database-name;" was called prior to calling this script

diff.author: Nimantha Baranasuriya
diff.sql: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `dataintegrity_integrity_checks`; CREATE TABLE `dataintegrity_integrity_checks` ( `dataintegrity_integrity_check_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `check_name` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `check_type` varchar(45) NOT NULL, `check_code` varchar(1000) NOT NULL, `check_result_type` varchar(45) NOT NULL, `check_fail` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `check_fail_operator` varchar(45) NOT NULL, `check_repair_type` varchar(45) default NULL, `check_repair` varchar(1000) default NULL, `check_parameters` varchar(500) default NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`dataintegrity_integrity_check_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

diff.author: Jeremy Keiper
diff.sql: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `dataintegrity_results`; CREATE TABLE `dataintegrity_results` ( `results_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `integrity_check_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `failed_record_count` int(10) NOT NULL, `check_passed` int(1) NOT NULL, `failed_records` mediumtext default NULL, `date_occurred` datetime NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`results_id`), CONSTRAINT `linked data integrity check` FOREIGN KEY (`integrity_check_id`) REFERENCES `dataintegrity_integrity_checks` (`dataintegrity_integrity_check_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

diff.author: Jeremy Keiper
diff.description: Added duration column to results table
diff.sql: ALTER TABLE `dataintegrity_results` ADD COLUMN `duration` BIGINT NOT NULL;
